metadata.description: The region to deploy the resources into
The name of the Sharepoint farm
The name of the Administrator of the new VMs and Domain
The password for the Administrator account of the new VMs and Domain
The size of the AD VMs Created
The size of the SQL VMs Created
The size of the Witness VM Created
The size of the SP VMs Created
The FQDN of the AD Domain created
The SQL Server Service account name
The SQL Server Service account password
The Sharepoint Setup account name
The Sharepoint Setup account password
The Sharepoint Farm account name
The Sharepoint Farm account password
The Sharepoint Farm Passphrase
The Sharepoint Content Site Template Name
The prefix of the new storage account created to store the VMs disks, different storage accounts will be created for AD,SQL and Sharepoint VMs
The type of the Storage Account created
The address range of the new VNET in CIDR format
The address range of the subnet static IPs are allocated from in the new VNET
The address range of the SQL subnet created in the new VNET
The address range of the SP Web subnet created in the new VNET
The address range of the SP App subnet created in the new VNET
The IP address of the new AD VM
The IP address of the new AD VM
The IP address of the new SQL ILB
Resource Group containing existing SP Web IP address
Indicates whether the Sharepoint farm's IP is new or existing
The new or existing - depending on value of spWebIPNewOrExisting parameter - IP address name for SP Web
The DNS Prefix for the Public IP Address for the Sharepoint Web Application
Name of virtual network to be created
Base URL for Marketplace
